name: Sarah Khan
text: AMAZING food. Loved every bite. The delivery time was okay. Service was also fabulous. I would definitely recommend and eat there again. Best pizza place in Waterbury

name: Shannon
text: I order from here OFTEN. It's hit or miss with the delivery folks and how long they take. A lot of times they are short staff and have only one person doing deliveries. Other times, the delivery is super fast so you just don't know what …More

text: This is the only pizza place near me that will deliver and was open when I placed an order online they cancelled it 10 minutes later without letting me know I called them and asked why and they said they didn’t have any drivers... really? …More

text: The guy who answered my call and ultimately delivered my pizza was the friendliest guy ever and gave great customer service. The pizza was great too.

text: First off it's clearly obvious that half of these reviews are the people who own it and want to give false reviews to gain business. This place was the worst pizza I have ever gotten from a fast food type pizza place. I've never seen a …More

text: I'll give 5 stars as we made our order, no additional hidden costs, and we received our pizza within about 5-10 minutes. It's easy to miss from the street if you're not familiar with the location as Google Maps took us past the location …More

text: they NEVER forget or mess up anything I order, food delivered HOT and within timely manner, excellent service!!! ignore the very bad comments they dont cook w pounds of grease and the dough is freshly made not frozen ice pucks like pizza hut!
